text: Aÿ-Champagne is a commune. It is in Grand Est in the Marne department in northeast France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Aÿ (the seat), Bisseuil and Mareuil-sur-Ay.Arrêté préfectoral 9 November 2015 == Related pages == * Communes of the Marne department == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Marne
title: Aÿ-Champagne
